name: Gift Of The Gods
description:
This game was created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 32!

The premise of the game is that you have ventured down a manhole in search of your keys you've managed to lose down the drain.

Therein, you meet an ancient (and decidedly lame) deity that bestows upon you random household items to defend yourself with. Each time you play the game you will randomly get one of two weapons to use.

Can you rise to the challenge?

Controls:

WSAD or Arrow Keys - Move

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Rate My Game!

KNOWN BUGS:

  • If you die, your health somehow does not update. The health bar will though, making it LOOK like you have full health. In fact though, you'll die in one shot. Sorry! Guess it's a hardcore mode to punish you for dying? (Or I just ran out of time to fix it!)
